thread.title: Microsoft Abandoning Realistic Gun Emoji, Following Apple, Google

author: Jonathan Vanian
title: Microsoft Abandoning Realistic Gun Emoji, Following Apple, Google
text:
By Jonathan Vanian April 26, 2018
Microsoft has decided to abandon a gun emoji that resembles a realistic looking gun in favor of one that looks more like a toy squirt gun.

Google (goog) is currently updating its gun emoji to resemble a more family friendly squirt gun for its Android operating system, with Facebook (fb) saying it intends to do so as well for its social networking service. Other companies to have updated their gun emoji include Apple (aapl) , which announced that it would change its gun emoji in 2016, and Twitter and Samsung.
